amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the overall funding appropriated in the bill by 1.9 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 21 in the Congressional Record of June 18, 1996, to reduce the overall funding appropriated in the bill by 1.9% and to apply the savings to reduce the deficit.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gutknecht amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 128 - 291 (Roll no. 264).
